page.title: 01The area around Irby
page.content: There are three main areas around Irby; Thurstaston,Greasby and Frankby. We have seen a lot of building work going on recently in Greasby and Irby. Thurstaston is still a tiny hamlet and has changed very little in the last 100 years. Greasby and Irby are mainly dormitory villages for Liverpool. There is a large park called Arrowe Park and a recently built hospital called Arrowe Park Hospital. The area is very pretty and most people enjoy living here.We also have a National Trust wood called Harrock Wood.
